data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Financial Support to MSMEs in ZED Certification - SC/ST - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides assistance of 50% of all charges on the amount for ZED Certification, up to a maximum amount of Rs. 0.5 lakh
data.eligibility: Enterprises involved in manufacturing (MSMEs) having Udyog Aadhaar/Udyam registration, and those holding a ZED Certificate.
data.conditions:
1. The cost for certificate will include site assessment fees and consultancy charges, Govt. Charges and other charges.
  2. Expenditure incurred for renewal of certificate shall not be eligible for assistance under the scheme.
  3. The Enterprise is eligible for maximum Three ZED Certificate during the operative period of scheme with total assistance of maximum Rs.50,000/- during policy period.
  4. This ZED certification scheme will be supplementary to such scheme of Government of India. However, in no case total assistance from GOG and GOI should exceed more than actual eligible expenditure incurred by MSME for said purpose.
  5. Service and Trading activities are ineligible for assistance under this scheme.
data.beneficiaries:
1. MSMEs engaged in manufacturing activity who have obtained ZED Certificate. Applicant should be Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe.
  2. MSMEs in the State. SC/ST enterprise means the enterprise in which contribution of SC/ST entrepreneur is 51% or more
data.prerequisites:
1. MSMEs must have availed benefit of ZED Certification under Central Government.
  2. To avail benefit, the MSME must be located in Gujarat.
  3. Beneficiaries will get benefit for all type of ZED Certification (i.e. Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum).
data.context:
The Industrial Policy 2020 envisions Gujarat as a global business destination for next-generation sustainable manufacturing and service industry that stimulates sustainable development, inclusive and a balanced regional growth. 

The primary mission of the Industrial Policy includes support for development of MSMEs, focus on Export Competitiveness : Vocal for Local to become Global and thus strengthen integrated value chains across product segments.
data.objective: To enable MSMEs to adopt Zero Defect Zero Effect manufacturing and assessment of their enterprises for ZED Certification.
data.description: The assistance of 50% of all charges on the amount after deducting the assistance received from Government of India for ZED Certification, up to a maximum amount of Rs. 50,000.
data.how_to_apply: Applicant can directly apply to Industries Commissioner.
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance will be release as reimbursement after the approval from Industries Commissioner
data.additional_info: The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail asssistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Signed copy of Application form* 
2. Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
3. Copy of the Constitution of the enterprise 
4. Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
5. Copy of PAN Card of Applicant/Promoters/Directors/partners and authorised signatory 
6. CA certificate for fixed capital investment 
7. Copy of Shareholding Pattern 
8. Copy of proof of ZED Certification 
9. Copy of the bill of expenditure occurred 
10. Undertaking* 
11. Copy of the Highlighted bank statement 
12. Copy of Gujarat Pollution Control Board approved NOC/Consent & other departments approval (if applicable) 
13. Copy of GST registration (if applicable) 
14. Copy CA Certified Balance-Sheet of the last financial year (if applicable) 
15. Expenditure statement (CA Certified) 
16. Copy of last electricity bill 
17. Copy of Testing equipment Purchased booklet (if applicable) 
18. Self-Attested documents/ details to be submitted by the Authorized Person 
19. Power of attorney/Board resolution/ Consent letter 
20. Supporting documents for SC/ST Enterprise
